Title: Molnija Award of Victory 1941-1945 WWII USSR Vintage Russian Men's Pocket Watch
Description: Molnija Award of Victory WWII - rare vintage USSR Russian legendary men's pocket watch - include chain which use for pocket wearing. The face cover have star of Award of Victory WWII and the back cover have inscription on russian language: World War II 1941-1945. The watch is produced at the Molnija Military watch factory, where also made: instrument panel clocks for MiG, aircraft and submarines. The factory was established on November 17, 1947. The watch has a movement analogous ROLEX 1930-1940’s. The creation of this outstanding mechanism was clearly inspired by the legendary ROLEX Cal. 5513 in 1930-1940's and is highly valued nowadays by the watch collectors and watch enthusiasts. If you know of saw - ROLEX Cal. 5513 you will notice some striking similarities, such as: very large screw balance wheel, fine timing regulation mechanism, plate’s layout, large and powerful mainspring, oversize jeweled stones, etc. This pocket watch has metal chrome case and the back cover have - ART DECO ENGRAVED raised pattern. Caliber of mechanism: 3602 and 18 Jewels. Mechanism has been recently serviced by one of the best watchmakers in my city and it have fully working condition. Dome glass is plastic (Plexiglas). This pocket watch comes to our time in good status and was very well saved - if considering.Approximate sizes:Diameter of watch with crown: 61 mmDiameter of watch: 50 mmDiameter of dial: 37 mmThickness of watch: 13 mmWe will send all items to Worldwide.Shipping is via International Air Mail.
